original: aṅko 'paraḥ sa garbhāṅkaḥ sabījaḥ phalavānapi // VisSd_6.20 //
analyzed: paraḥ sa garbha aṅkaḥ sa bījaḥ phalavān api
vijña priyā
garbhāṅkaḥ pradhāna aṅka madhye paraḥ ṅkaḥ tad lakṣaṇam āha aṅka udara iti
prathamatas bhinayena naṭa praveśaḥ raṅga dvāram
tat vakṣyati yasmāt abhinayāt pūrvam ityādinā atra ca abhinayaḥ nāṭya vastu pradarśanam
garbha aṅkaḥ prathama aṅke eva iti niyama abhāvāt āharaṅga dvārā mukha ādi iti
āmukham prastāvanā tad lakṣaṇam agre vakṣyate
ādi padāt ca parigrahaḥ
vakṣyate hi vṛtta varttiṣyamāṇa kathā aṃśa pradarśaka ubhinayaḥ viṣkambhakaḥ
saca madhyavidha jana pravarttitaḥ śuddhaḥ
madhya nīcābhyām pravarttitaḥ saṃkīrṇaḥ
nīca jana mātra pravarttitaḥ praveśakaḥ
teṣām tu sakala aṅke eva sambhavaḥ
aṅka udaraḥ iti

original: mukhyanāṭakamadhye kenāpi pātreṇa nāṭakāntarapradarśanaṃ garbhāṅka ityarthaḥ /
analyzed: mukhya nāṭaka madhye kena api pātreṇa nāṭaka antara pradarśanam garbhāṅkaḥ iti arthaḥ
tad pradarśana phalam āha sabījaḥ iti tad pradarśanāt
mukhya nāṭaka abhinetavya arthasya aṅkura phalayoḥ lābhāt tat dvayavān iti arthaḥ
yathā bālarāmāyaṇaḥ rāvaṇam prati kohalaḥ

bhavat artham iva nibaddham nāṭyam sītā svayaṃvaraṇam
ityādinā viracitaḥ sītāsvayaṃvaraḥ nāma garbha aṅkaḥ

original: (vi, ḍha) taṃ gārbhāṅkaṃ darśayati---yathā bālarāmāyaṇa ityādi---tatra hi kenāpi kavinā nibaddhaṃ śravaṇairityādiguṇayuktaṃ sītasvayamvaraṃ  #

original: pitrā rājājñayā jarate nandanāya dātuṃ kṛtaniścayā mālatīti devatagṛhe svamaraṇaṃ prārthayantī lavaṅgikāyāḥ pāde patitā mālatī /

original: stambhantaritasthito mādhavaśca lavaṅgikāveśena āgatya lavaṅgikām apasārya tatsthāne svapādaṃ dattvā sthitaḥ /

original: tato mālatī utthāyā lavaṅgikābuddhyā tamāliṅgya paścād dṛṣṭvā paricīyamānā vyavasāyat nivavṛte ityarthaḥ /

original: sattvādibhiḥ samastavyastālpatarair bahulā tadvaiśiṣṭyāt bāhulyavatī harṣādyanyatarayuktā vṛttiśca sāttvatītyarthaḥ /

rājan iti ṛṣibhiḥ vācyaḥ saḥ pati apratyayena ca
locanā
lo ū apatya pratyayena yathā ahe rāghava
he dāśarathe ityādi
sva icchayā nāmabhiḥ vipra vipraḥ ārya iti ca itaraiḥ
vijña priyā
vi śa rājan iti

original: sa rājā ṛṣibhiḥ rājannati apatyapratyayena ca vācya ityarthaḥ /
analyzed: sa rājā ṛṣibhiḥ rājan ati apatyapratyayena ca vācyaḥ iti arthaḥ
yathā anargha rāghave aindumateya iti viśvāmitreṇa daśarathaḥ
vipraḥ tu vipraiḥ sva icchayā nāmabhiḥ vācyaḥ
itaraiḥ tu āryya iti

original: vayasyetyathavā nāmnā vācyo rājñā viḍhūṣakaḥ // VisSd_6.146 //
analyzed: vayasya iti athavā nāmnā vācyaḥ rājñā viḍhūṣakaḥ
vācyau naṭī sūtradhāra vārya nāmnā parasparam
vijña priyā
vi sa vayasya iti athavā iti
vidūṣakaḥ rājñā vayasya iti vācyaḥ
athavā nāmnā eva iti
vācyau naṭī sūtradhārau iti
āryya nāmnā iti
tena naṭyāḥ āyyarputraḥ iti
sūtradhāreṇa āryyā iti vācyau iti arthaḥ

original: sūtradhāraṃ vadedbhāva iti vai pāripārśivakaḥ // VisSd_6.147 //
analyzed: sūtradhāram vadet bhāvaḥ iti vai pāripārśivakaḥ
sūtradhāraḥ māriṣa iti haṇḍe iti adhamaiḥ samāḥ
vijña priyā
vi sa māriṣa iti pāripārśvikam vadet
iti samāḥ tulya janāḥ
adhamaiḥ haṇḍā iti vācyā
vayasya iti uttamaiḥ haho madhyaiḥ ārya iti ca agrajaḥ
bhagavan iti vaktavyāḥ sarvaiḥ deva ṣi liṅginaḥ
vijña priyā
vi ha samāḥ uttamaiḥ tu vayasyā iti
madhyamaiḥ tu haṃho iti vācyāḥ iti arthaḥ
agrajaḥ sa anujaiḥ āryya iti arthaḥ
bhagavan iti

original: devarṣayo liṅginaḥ parivrājakāśca sarvaireva bhagavanniti vācyāḥ /
analyzed: devarṣayaḥ liṅginaḥ parivrājakāḥ ca sarvaiḥ eva bhagavan iti vācyāḥ

original: vadedrājñīṃ ca ceṭīṃ ca bhavatīti vidūṣakaḥ // VisSd_6.149 //
analyzed: vadet rājñīm ca ceṭīm ca bhavatī iti vidūṣakaḥ

original: āyuṣman rathinaṃ sūto vṛddhaṃ tāteti cetaraḥ /
analyzed: āyuṣman rathinam sūtaḥ vṛddham tāta iti ca itaraḥ
vijña priyā

original: (vi, ka) rathinaṃ vṛddhasūta āyuṣmanniti itarastu tāteti vadedityarthaḥ /
analyzed: vi ka rathinam vṛddha sūta āyuṣman iti itaraḥ tu tāta iti vadet iti arthaḥ

original: vatsaputrakatāteti nāmnā gotreṇa vā sutaḥ // VisSd_6.150 //
analyzed: vatsaputrakatātā iti nāmnā gotreṇa vā sutaḥ
locanā
lo ṛ gotreṇa yathā ahe kauśika
he ātreya ityādi
śiṣyaḥ nujaḥ ca vaktavyaḥ mātyaḥ ārya iti ca adhamaiḥ
vijña priyā
vi kha vatsa putraka iti
sutaḥ śiṣyaḥ nujaḥ ca vatsa ityādibhiḥ vaktavyaḥ iti arthaḥ
vipraiḥ ayam amātya iti saciva iti ca bhaṇyate

original: sādho / iti tapasvī ca praśāntaścocyate budhaiḥ /
analyzed: sādho iti tapasvī ca praśāntaḥ ca ucyate budhaiḥ
vijña priyā
praśāntaḥ ca iti śāntaḥ janaḥ iti arthaḥ
sva gṛhīta abhidhaḥ pūjyaḥ śiṣya ādyaiḥ vinigadyate
upādhyāya iti ca ācāryaḥ mahā rāja iti bhūpatiḥ
svāmī iti yuvarājaḥ tu kumāraḥ bhartṛdārakaḥ
bhadra saumya mukha iti evam adhamaiḥ tu kumārakaḥ
vijña priyā
vi gha bhūpatiḥ mahā rāja iti
yuvarājaḥ tu svamīte sambodhane vācyaḥ iti arthaḥ
evam uttaratra api
kumāraḥ yuvarājā itaraḥ

original: vācyā prakṛtibhī rājñaḥ kumārī bhartṛdārikā // VisSd_6.154 //
analyzed: vācyā prakṛtibhiḥ rājñaḥ kumārī bhartṛ dārikā
patiḥ yathā tathā vācyāḥ jyeṣṭha madhya adhamaiḥ striyaḥ
vijña priyā
vi ṅa patiḥ yathā iti

original: jyeṣṭha uttamastathā cottamamadhyamādhamaiḥ svastriyaḥ strībhiḥ patiryathā tathā vācya ityarthaḥ /
analyzed: jyeṣṭhaḥ uttamaḥ tathā ca uttama madhyama adhamaiḥ sva striyaḥ strībhiḥ patiḥ yathā tathā vācyaḥ iti arthaḥ

original: tathā cāryyaputreti patyurucyamānatvāt āryyaiti patyā striyo vācyā ityarthaḥ /
analyzed: tathā ca āryya putra iti patyuḥ ucyamāna tvāt āryyā eti patyā striyaḥ vācyāḥ iti arthaḥ
locanā
patiḥ yathā iti
patiḥ yena svāmin iti ucyate tena tad bhāryyā svāminī iti
yena bharttā iti tena bhaṭṭiṇīte
hala iti sadṛśī
preṣyā hañje veśyā ajjukā tathā
kuṭṭinī ambā iti anugataiḥ pūjyā ca jaratī janaiḥ
vijña priyā
ca veśyā sambodhane ajjukā iti ucyate iti arthaḥ
bhaṭṭini ambā iti
anugataiḥ janaiḥ arthāt anugamyamāna strībhiḥ bhaṭṭinī iti ambā iti ca ucyate
itaraiḥ janaiḥ pūjyā vṛddhā jarati iti vācyā iti arthaḥ
āmantraṇaiḥ ca pāṣaṇḍāḥ vācyāḥ sva samaya āgataiḥ
locanā
lo ḷ he cārvāka
he kolikeya ityādi
śakā śakyā dayaḥ ca saṃbhāṣyāḥ bhadradatta ādi nāmabhiḥ
vijña priyā
pāṣaṇḍāḥ ca sva samaya āgataiḥ āmantraṇaiḥ ca vācyāḥ iti arthaḥ
śākya ādayaḥ bauddha ādayaḥ

original: yasya yatkarma śilpaṃ vā vidyā vā jātireva vā // VisSd_6.157 //
analyzed: yasya yat karma śilpam vā vidyā vā jātiḥ eva vā
tena eva nāmnā vācyaḥ sau jñeyāḥ ca anye yathocitam
atha bhāṣā vibhāgaḥ
puruṣāṇām anīcānām saṃskṛtam syāt kṛtātmanām
sorasenī prayoktavyā tādṛśīnām ca yoṣitām
vijña priyā
vi ja atha bhāṣa iti
vaktṛ viśeṣasya bhāṣā viśeṣaḥ iti arthaḥ
puruṣāṇām iti
nīca itareṣām kṛtātmanām śuddhānām puruṣāṇām iti anvayaḥ

original: śaurasenyādayo bahvyo bhāṣāḥ prākṛtaviśeṣāḥ prākṛtavṛttau anusandheyāḥ /
analyzed: śaurasenī ādayaḥ bahvyaḥ bhāṣāḥ prākṛta viśeṣāḥ prākṛta vṛttau anusandheyāḥ

original: āsāmeva tu gāthāsu mahārāṣṭrīṃ prayojayet // VisSd_6.159 //
analyzed: āsām eva tu gāthāsu mahārāṣṭrīm prayojayet
atrā uktā māgadhī bhāṣā rāja antar pura cāriṇām
vijña priyā
vi tādṛśānām anīcānām
nāthāḥ gītayaḥ
atra iti
gāthasu iti arthaḥ
ceṭānām rāja putrāṇām śreṣṭhānām ca ardhamagadhī
prācyām vidūṣaka ādīnām
dhūrtānām syāt avanti jā
vijña priyā
vi ña ceṭānām iti
śreṣṭhinām rāja putra ceṭānām iti arthaḥ
yodha nāgarika ādīnām dākṣiṇātyāḥ hi dīvyatām
śavarāṇām śaka ādānām śābarīm saṃprayojayet
vijña priyā
ahidīvyatām sarpa śelakānām teṣām ca iti anvayaḥ
śakāraḥ rājaśālakaḥ
śakānām pārvatīya mleccha viśeṣāṇām
vāhlīka bhāṣa udīcyānām drāviḍī drāviḍa ādiṣu
ābhīreṣu tathā ābhīrī cāṇḍālī pukkasa ādiṣu
vijña priyā
vi ṭha puktasaḥ caṇḍāla viśeṣaḥ
ābhīrī śābarī ca api kāṣṭha pātra upajīviṣu
tathā eva aṅgārakāra ādau paiśācī syāt piśāca vāc
ceṭīnām aṣi anīcānām api syāt saurasenikā
bālānām ṣaṇḍakānām ca nīca graha vicāriṇām
unmattānām āturāṇām sā eva syāt saṃskṛtam kvacid
vijña priyā
vi ḍa ṣaṇḍakāḥ napuṃsakāḥ
nīcānām graha vicārakāṇām ca iti anvayaḥ
sā eva śaurasenikā eva
kvacid eṣām saṃskṛtam api iti arthaḥ
aiśvaryeṇa pramattasya dāridrya upadrutasya ca
bhikṣu valkadhara ādīnām prākṛtam saṃprayojayet
saṃskṛtam saṃprayoktavyam liṅginīṣu uttamāsu ca
devī mantri sutā veśyāsu api kaiścid tathā uditam
vijña priyā
tathā uditam saṃskṛta uktiḥ
yat deśyam tat deśyam tasya bhāṣitam
vijña priyā
vi ṇa yad deśyam yad deśīyam
kāryataḥ ca uttama ādīnām kāryaḥ bhāṣā viparyayaḥ
tathā
vaidagdhyā atha pradātavyam saṃskṛtam ca antarā antarā
eṣām udāharaṇāni ākareṣu boddhavyāni
bhāṣā lakṣaṇāni mama tāta pādānām bhāṣā arṇave
ṣaṭtriṃśat lakṣaṇāni atra
nāṭya alaṃkṛtayaḥ tathā
trayastriṃśat prayojyāni vīthi aṅgāni trayodaśa
lāsya aṅgāni daśa yathā lābham rasa vyapekṣayā
vijña priyā
vi te ṣaṭtriṃśat iti

original: atra nāṭakalakṣaṇāni sakalāni ṣaṭtriṃśaddharmāṇi prayojyāni ityarthaḥ /
analyzed: atra nāṭaka lakṣaṇāni sakalāni ṣaṭtriṃśat dharmāṇi prayojyāni iti arthaḥ
tathā ca trayaḥ triṃśat nāṭya alaṅkṛtayaḥ
trayodaśa vīthi aṅgāni
da śa lāsya aṅgāni yathālābham prayojyāni
tatra ṣaṭtriṃśat lakṣaṇāni uddiśati bhūṣaṇa iti
yathālābham prayojyāni iti sambandhaḥ
atra iti nāṭake
tatra lakṣaṇāni
bhūṣaṇa akṣara saṃghātau śobhā udāharaṇam tathā
hetu saṃśaya dṛṣṭāntāḥ tulya tarkaḥ pada uccayaḥ

original: nidarśanābhiprāyau ca prāptirvicāra eva ca // VisSd_6.172 //
analyzed: nidarśana abhiprāyau ca prāptiḥ vicāraḥ eva ca
diṣṭa upadiṣṭe ca guṇa atipāta atiśayau tathā
viśeṣaṇa niruktī ca siddhi bhraśa viparyayau
dākṣiṇya anunayau mālā arthāpattiḥ garhaṇam tathā

original: pṛcchā prasiddhiḥ sārūpyaṃ saṃkṣepo guṇakīrtanam // VisSd_6.174 //

analyzed: leśaḥ manorathaḥ priyavacaḥ tathā
tatra
lakṣaṇāni guṇaiḥ sa alaṃkāraiḥ yogaḥ tu bhūṣaṇam
vijña priyā
vi tha lakṣaṇāni iti
etāni lakṣaṇa saṃjñakāni ṣaṭtriṃśat iti arthaḥ
yathā ākṣipanti aravindāni mugdhe
tava mukha śriyam
koṣa daṇḍa samagraṇām kim eṣām asti duṣkaram
vijña priyā

original: (vi, da) atra bhūṣaṇasaṃjñakasya lakṣaṇasya lakṣaṇamāha--tatra guṇairiti /
analyzed: atra bhūṣaṇa saṃjñakasya lakṣaṇasya lakṣaṇam āha tatra guṇaiḥ iti
ābhipanti iti
aravindāni karttṝṇi
ākṣipanti adhikṣipanti sparddhante vā

original: koṣaḥ kuṅbhavā evā ko ṣo dhanam /

daṇḍaḥ nālam eva daṇḍaḥ śāstiḥ
artha śleṣa mūla ūrtha antaranyāsaḥ laṅkāraḥ

locanā
ākṣipanti iti koṣaḥ kuḍmalaḥ dravya oghaḥ ca
daṇḍaḥ na alam duṣṭa nigrahaḥ ca
varṇanā akṣara saṃghātaḥ citra arthaiḥ akṣaraiḥ mitaiḥ
yathā śākuntale rājā a kaccit sakhīm vaḥ na atibādhate śarīra saṃtāpaḥ
priyaṃvadā sampadam ladhosahaḥ uasamam gamissadi
vijña priyā
vi dha akṣara saṅghātam iti
varṇanā iti
citra arthaiḥ mitaiḥ akṣaraiḥ varṇanā iti arthaḥ
sampadam iti

atra tvad praptiḥ eva auṣadha prāptiḥ iti bhaṅgyā kathayamāna arthaḥ citraḥ
akṣarāṇi ca alpāni
siddhaiḥ arthaiḥ samam yatra aprasiddhaḥ ṛthaḥ prakāśate
śliṣṭa ślakṣaṇa citra arthā sā śobhā iti abhidhīyate

original: siddhairupamānabhūtairarthaiḥ samamekavākyenaiva aprasiddha upameyabhūtor'tho vidheyānvayārthaṃ prakāśate /
analyzed: siddhaiḥ upamāna bhūtaiḥ arthaiḥ samam eka vākyena eva aprasiddhaḥ upameya bhūtaḥ ūrthaḥ vidheya anvaya artham prakāśate
sā śobhā kīdṛśī
śliṣṭa śabda cihna citra artha iti arthaḥ

saṃdvaṃśa sambhavaḥ śuddhaḥ guṇa anvitaḥ

original: kāmaṃ dhanuriva krūro varjanīyaḥ satāṃ prabhuḥ /

original: dhanuriva krūraḥ prabhuḥ kāma yatheṣṭaṃ satāṃ varjanīyaḥ /

āvarjana hetu sattve pi krauryāt varjanīyaḥ iti arthaḥ
dvayoḥ eva avarjana hetūn śleṣāt āha sat vaṃśa iti
sat vaṃśaḥ sat veṇuḥ sat kulam ca
śuddhaḥ kīṭa āviddhaḥ niṣpāpaḥ ca

original: koṭi koṭisaṃkhyakaṃ dhanaṃ dadāti tathākoṭyādyatiguṇo jyā śauryādiśca /

yathā

analyzed: keṣāñcid vakṣyamāṇa upamā vyatireka alaṅkāra ādi rūpa tvena teṣu kāvya aṅgeṣu keṣāñcid ca guṇa bhāva tad samvandhi vyañjaka tvena teṣu kāvya aṅgeṣu antarbhāva sambhave
pi iti arthaḥ

original: prayatnataḥ karttavyatvāditi---karttavyatā ca tattaprasaṅgaucityānusāreṇa yathāyogyameva na tu sarvatraiva sarveṣābhityavadheyam /
analyzed: prayatnataḥ karttavya tvāt iti karttavya tā ca tad tad prasaṅga aucitya anusāreṇa yathāyogyam eva na tu sarvatra eva sarveṣām iti avadheyam
etāni ca
pañca sandhi catur vṛtti catuḥ ṣaṣṭi aṅga saṃyutam
ṣaḍaviṃśat lakṣaṇa upetam alaṅkāra upaśobhitam
mahārasam mahā bhogam udātta racanā anvitam
locanā
mahārasa miti rasa bhāva nirantaram
mahā puruṣa satkāram sādhu ācāram jana priyam
su śliṣṭa sandhi yogam ca su prayogam sukha āśrayam
mṛdu śabda abhidhānam ca kaviḥ kuryāt tu nāṭakam
iti muninā ukta tvāt nāṭake vaśyam kartavyāni eva vīthi aṅgāni vakṣyante
vijña priyā

original: (vi, la) sukavinā tu etat sakalaviśiṣṭamapi naṭakaṃ karttyamiti munināṃktatvāt tena sarvabhidaṃ karttavyamityāha---pañcasandhi caturvṛttītyādi  #
analyzed: su kavinā tu etat sakala viśiṣṭam api naṭakam karttyam iti tena sarva bhidam karttavyam iti āha pañca sandhi catur vṛtti ityādi
kuryāt tu nāṭakam ityantam
pañca sandhayaḥ mukha sandhyā ādyāḥ prāc uktāḥ pañca
catuḥ ṣaṣṭi aṅgāni ca sandhīnām prāc uktāni
ṣaṭtriṃśat lakṣaṇāni ca nāṭyānām prāc uktāni
alaṅkāraḥ trayastriṃśat sampratyuktāḥ
trayastriṃśat prayojyāni vīthi aṅgāni trayodaśa

original: ityuktatvāt trayastriṃśadalaṅkāroktyanantaraṃ vīthyaṅgānāṃ vaktavyatve prāpte vīthirūpakanāṭakaviśeṣasya
analyzed: iti ukta tvāt trayastriṃśat alaṅkāra ukti anantaram vīthi aṅgānām vaktavya tve prāpte vīthi rūpaka nāṭaka viśeṣasya

original: viśipya darśitatvāt darśayiṣyamāṇatadavasare vīthyaṅgāni vakṣyante ityāha---vīthyaṅgānīti /
analyzed: viśipya darśita tvāt darśayiṣyamāṇa tad avasare vīthi aṅgāni vakṣyante iti āha vīthi aṅgāni iti
lāsya aṅgāni āha
geya padam sthita pāṭhyam āsīnam puṣpa gaṇḍikā
pracchedakaḥ tri gūḍham ca saindhava ākhyam dvi gūḍhakam
uttamottamakam ca anyat ukta pratyuktam eva ca
lāsye daśavidham hi etat aṅgam uktam manīṣibhiḥ
vijña priyā
vi va daśa lāsya aṅgāni vaktum āha lāsya aṅgāni iti
tatra
tantrī bhāṇḍam puraskṛtya upaviṣṭasya āsane puras
śuddham gānam geya padam
locanā
lo u śuṣkam anukaraṇīyam
yathā gaurī gṛhe vīṇām vādayantī malayavatī
utphulla kala kesara parāga gaura dyute
mama hi gauri  /
abhivāñchitam prasidhyatu bhagavati
yuṣmad prasādena
vijña priyā
tatra geya pada rūpam lāsya aṅgam āha tantrī bhāṇḍa iti

original: tantrībhāṇḍam tantryāśrayāṃ vīṇāṃ puraskṛtya pradhānīkṛtya śuṣkaṃ gānaṃ nṛtyahīnagānam /
analyzed: tantrī bhāṇḍam tantrī āśrayām vīṇām puraskṛtya pradhānīkṛtya śuṣkam gānam nṛtya hīna gānam
utphulla iti mama abhivāñchitam iti anvayaḥ
sthita pāṭhyam tat ucyate

original: madanottāpitā yatra paṭhati prākṛtaṃ sthitā // VisSd_6.215 //
analyzed: madana uttāpitā yatra paṭhati prākṛtam sthitā
abhinavagupta pādāḥ tu āhuḥ upalakṣaṇam ca etat
krodha udbhrāntasya api prākṛta paṭhanam sthita pāṭhyam iti
nikhila ātodya rahitam śoka cintā anvitā abalā
a prasādhita gātram yat āsīna āsīnam eva tat
vijña priyā
vi se āsīnam aṅgam āha nikhila ātodya iti
mṛdaṅga ādi vādya rahitam
śoka ākulā vastra ācchādita gātrī yat tiṣṭhati tat āsīnam iti arthaḥ
ātodya miśritam geyam chandāṃsi vividhāni ca
strīpuṃsayoḥ viparyāsa ceṣṭitam puṣpagaṇḍikā
vijña priyā
vi sa puṣpagaṇḍikā ākhyam aṅgam āha ātodya iti
chandāṃsi viparyāsaḥ caṣṭa avyatyāsaḥ
locanā
viparyāsa ceṣṭitam striyāḥ puruṣasya coṣṭitam
paruṣasya strī ceṣṭitam
anya āsaktam patim matvā prema viccheda manyunā

original: vīṇāpuraḥsaraṃ gānaṃ striyāḥ pracchedako mataḥ // VisSd_6.218 //
analyzed: vīṇā puraḥsaram gānam striyāḥ pracchedakaḥ mataḥ
vijña priyā
vi ha praccheda ākhyam aṅgam āha anya āsaktam iti
ukta manyunā patim avajñāya vīṇā purassaram gānam iti arthaḥ
strī veṣa dhāriṇām puṃsām nāṭyam ślakṣṇam tri gūḍhakam
vijña priyā
vi ka trigūḍha ākhyam aṅgam āha strī veśa iti
ślakṣṇam manoharam
makarandaḥ iti
tena mālatī pratāraṇāya lavaṅgikā veśasya nandana pratāraṇāya mālatī veśa dhāraṇāt
yathā mālatyām makarandaḥ eṣaḥ smi mālatī saṃvṛttaḥ
kaścana bhraṣṭa saṃketaḥ su vyakta karaṇa anvitaḥ

original: prākṛtaṃ vacanaṃ vaktiṃ yatra tatsaindhavaṃ matam /
analyzed: prākṛtam vacanam vaktim yatra tat saindhavam matam
karaṇam vīṇā ādi kriyā
catur astra padam gītam mukha pratimukha anvitam
locanā
catur astra padam bharata ādi prasiddham
dvi gūḍham rasa bhāva āḍhyam
uttama uttamakam punar
kopa prasāda jam adhikṣepa yuktam rasottaram
vijña priyā
dvi gūḍhakam aṅgam āha catur astra padam iti
pāda catuṣṭaya anvitam gītam iti arthaḥ
tat ca gītam mukha pratimukha sandhyoḥ geyam iti arthaḥ
uttamottamakam aṅgam āha auttamottamakam punar iti
kopa iti
lāsyam kadācid kopa ja tvāt adhikṣepa yuktam
kadācid prasāda ja tvāt rasa uttaram iti arthaḥ
hāva helā iti
helā bhinnaḥ tra hāvaḥ go vṛṣa nyāyāt helā bāhulya artham tat
hāva helā anvitam citra śloka bandha manoharam
ukti pratyukti saṃyuktam sa upālambham alīkavat
vilāsa anvita gīta artha mukta pratyuktam ucyate
vijña priyā
vi gaḥ ukta pratyuktam aṅgam āha okti pratyukti iti
upālambhaḥ upahāsaḥ
sa ca alīka artham upanyasya iti āha alīka vat iti
spaṣṭāni udāharaṇāni
etat eva yadā sarvaiḥ patākā sthānakaiḥ yutam
aṅkaiḥ ca daśabhiḥ dhorāḥ mahā nāṭakam ūcire
vijña priyā
mahānāṭaka ākhyam nāṭaka prabhedam āha etat eva iti
nāṭakam eva iti arthaḥ
sarvaiḥ patākā sthānakaiḥ iti
sahasā eva artha sampattiḥ guṇavatī upacārataḥ
patākā sthānakam idam prathamam parikīrttitam
ityādibhiḥ uktaiḥ caturbhiḥ patāka sthānakaiḥ iti arthaḥ
locanā

original: (lo, ṝ) evaṃ naṭakalakṣaṇaṃ gobalīvardanyāyena bhinnaṃ mahānāṭakalakṣaṇam /
analyzed: evam naṭaka lakṣaṇam gobalīvarda nyāyena bhinnam mahā nāṭaka lakṣaṇam
etat eva nāṭakam
yathā bālarāmāyaṇam
atha prakaraṇam
bhavet prakaraṇaḥ vṛttam laukikam kavi kalpitam
śṛṅgāraḥ ṅgī nāyakaḥ tu vipraḥ mātyaḥ vaṇij
sa apāya dharma kāma artha paraḥ dhīra śāntakaḥ
locanā
atha uddeśya kameṇa prakaraṇa ādīn nirūpayati bhava uditi

original: laukikaṃ na tu divyaṃ miśraṃ vā /
analyzed: laukikam na tu divyam miśram vā
vipra nāyakam yathā mṛcchakaṭikam
amātya nāyakam mālatī mādhavam
vijña priyā

original: (vi, ṅa) nāṭakaprakaraṇabhāṇādayo ye rūpakoparūpakaprabhedā utkīrttitā “vinā viśeṣaṃ sarveṣāṃ lakṣma nāṭakavanmatam” /
analyzed: nāṭaka prakaraṇa bhāṇa ādayaḥ ye rūpaka uparūpaka prabhedāḥ utkīrttitāḥ vinā viśeṣam sarveṣām lakṣma nāṭaka vat matam
iti ukta tvāt ittham sa aṅga upāṅga nāṭaka lakṣaṇam uktvā prakaraṇa ākhyam dvitīya rūpakam āha atha prakaraṇam iti
vṛttam tat nāṭya varṇanīya prasaṅgaḥ
tat ca kavinā eva kalpita tvena purāṇeṣu adṛṣṭa tvāt laukikam
sā apāyā iti

original: śṛṅgāritvena kadāciddharmasya nāyikāyā mānāt kadācitkāmasya kāmārthavyavasāyāt arthasya cāpāyavānityarthaḥ /
analyzed: śṛṅgāri tvena kadācid dharmasya nāyikāyāḥ mānāt kadācid kāmasya kāma artha vyavasāyāt arthasya ca apāyavān iti arthaḥ
dhīra praśāntaḥ iti
sāmānya guṇaiḥ bhūyān dvija ādikaḥ
tad lakṣaṇam prāk uktam
puṣpa bhūṣitam prakaraṇa viśeṣaḥ

original: nāyikā kulajā kvāpi veśyā kvāpi dvayaṃ kvacit /
analyzed: nāyikā kula jā kvāpi veśyā kvāpi dvayam kvacid
tena bhedāḥ trayaḥ tasya tatra bhedaḥ tṛtīyakaḥ
kitava dyūta kāra ādi viṭa ceṭaka saṃkulaḥ
vijña priyā
vi ca tena bhedāḥ trayaḥ tasya iti

original: tasya prakaraṇasya kulajā veśyā tadubhayanāyikābhedāt bhedakṣatrayam /
analyzed: tasya prakaraṇasya kula jā veśyā tad ubhaya nāyikā bhedāt bheda kṣa trayam
tatra ubhaya nāyaka tve tṛtīya bheda pātrāṇi āha kitava iti
kula strī puṣpa bhūṣite
veśyā tu raṅga vṛtte
dve api mṛcchakaṭike
asya nāṭaka prakṛti tvāt śeṣam nāṭaka vat
atha bhāṇaḥ
bhāṇaḥ syāt dhūrta caritaḥ nānā avasthā antara ātmakaḥ

original: ekāṅka eka evātra nipuṇaḥ paṇḍito viṭaḥ /
analyzed: eka aṅkaḥ ekaḥ eva atra nipuṇaḥ paṇḍitaḥ viṭaḥ
raṅge prakāśayet svena anubhūtam itareṇa vā
kuryāt ākāśa bhāṣitaiḥ
sūcayet vīra śṛṅgārau śaurya saubhāgya varṇanaiḥ
tatra aitivṛttam utpādyam vṛttiḥ prāyeṇa bhārati

original: mukhanivahaṇo sandhī lāsyāṅgāni daśāpi ca // VisSd_6.230 //
analyzed: sandhī lāsya aṅgāni daśa api ca
vijña priyā
bhāṇa ākhyam rūpakam āha atha iti
na anāvasthā iti

original: nāṭakasyāntarātmā nāyakaḥ sa nānāvastho yatra tādṛśaḥ /
analyzed: nāṭakasya antarātmā nāyakaḥ sa nānā avasthaḥ yatra tādṛśaḥ
paṇḍitaḥ eva dhūrttaḥ bodhyaḥ
svane itareṇa vā anubhūta artham iti anvayaḥ
sūcayet iti
śauryeṇa vīram
saubhāgyena śṛṅgāram
sūcayet iti arthaḥ
utpādyam kavinā eva
atra ākāśa bhāṣita rūpa para vacanam api svayam eva anuvadan uttara pratyuttare kuryāt
śṛṅgāra vīra rasau ca saubhāgya śaurya varṇanayā sūcayet
prāyeṇa bhāratī
kvāpi kauśikī api vṛttiḥ bhavati
lāsya aṅgāni geya pada ādīni
udāhaṇam līlā madhukaraḥ
vijña priyā
vi vyācaṣṭe atra iti
atha vyāyogaḥ
khyāta iti vṛttaḥ vyāyogaḥ su alpa strī jana saṃyutaḥ
hīnaḥ garbha vimarśābhyām naraiḥ bahubhiḥ āśritaḥ
locanā
prakaraṇāt bhedaḥ garbha avimarśa abhāvena
eka aṅkaḥ ca bhavet astrī nimitta samara udayaḥ
kaiśikī vṛtti rahitaḥ prakhyātaḥ tatra nāyakaḥ
rājaṣiḥ atha divyaḥ vā bhavet dhīra uddhataḥ ca saḥ
hāsya śṛṅgāra śāntebhyaḥ itare tra aṅginaḥ rasāḥ
yathā saugandha eka āharaṇam
atha samavakāraḥ
vṛttam samavakāre tu khyātam deva asura āśrayam
sandhayaḥ nirvimarśāḥ tu trayaḥ ṅkāḥ tatra ca ādime
sandhī dvau antyayoḥ tadvat ekaḥ ekaḥ bhavet punar
nāyakāḥ dvādaśa udāttāḥ prakhyātāḥ deva mānavāḥ
phalam pṛthak pṛthak teṣām vīra mukhyaḥ khilaḥ rasaḥ
vṛttayaḥ manda kauśikyaḥ na atra bindu praveśakau
vīthi aṅgāni ca tatra syuḥ yayā alābham trayodaśa
gāyatrī uṣṇih mukhāni atra chandāṃsi vividhāni ca
locanā
gāyatrī ādīnām chandasām lakṣaṇāni ākāreṣu boddhavyāni
tri śṛṅgāraḥ tri kapaṭaḥ kāryaḥ ca ayam tri vidravaḥ
vastu dvādaśa nālībhiḥ niṣpādyam prathama aṅka gam
dvitīye ṅke catasṛbhiḥ dvābhyām aṅke tṛtīyake
vijña priyā
vyāyoga ākhyam rūpakam āha atha iti
samavakāra ākhyam rūpakam āha atha iti
ādime ṅke antyayoḥ aṅkayoḥ ekaḥ sandhiḥ iti arthaḥ
manda kauśikyaḥ kauśikyāḥ eva amtara viśeṣāḥ
triśṛṅgāra ādikam svayam eva vyākhyāsyati vastu iti
prathama aṅka gam prathama aṅka bodhanīyam vastu
ghaṭikā dvaya ātmaka nāḍī dvādaśakaiḥ aṣṭacatvāriṃśat daṇḍaiḥ niṣpādyam kāryam iti arthaḥ
nālikā ghaṭikā dvayam ucyate
bindupraveśakau ca nāṭaka uktau api na iha vidhātavyau
vijña priyā
vyācaṣṭe nāḍikā ca iti ghaṭikā daṇḍa dvayam
tatra
dharma artha kāmaiḥ trividhaḥ śṛṅgāraḥ
kapaṭaḥ punar
svābhāvikaḥ kṛtrimaḥ ca daiva jaḥ vidravaḥ punar
acetanaiḥ cetanaiḥ ca cetana acetanaiḥ kṛtaḥ
vijña priyā
tatra śṛṅgāra ādikam kārikayā āha dharma artha iti
tri kapaṭa tvam vyākhyātum kapaṭa traividhyam āha kapaṭaḥ punar iti
tri vidrava tvam vyākhyātum āha vidravaḥ punar iti
kautukena pratāraṇa ādi viśeṣaḥ vidravaḥ

original: sa cācetanaiḥ kāṣṭhaputtalikādibhiścetanaiḥ prahasanakaraiścetanācetanaiścetanatve 'pi prakṛṣṭacetanārahitaiḥ paśvādibhiḥ tadvakṣyati /
analyzed: sa ca acetanaiḥ kāṣṭha puttalikā ādibhiḥ cetanaiḥ prahasana karaiḥ cetana acetanaiḥ cetana tve pi prakṛṣṭa cetanā rahitaiḥ paśu ādibhiḥ tat vakṣyati
gaja ādibhiḥ iti tatra dharma śṛṅgāra ādikam icchayā vyutkameṇa darśayati
tatra śāstra avirodhena kṛtaḥ dharma śṛṅgāraḥ
tatra kāmaśṛṅgāraḥ prathama aṅkaḥ eva
anyayoḥ tu na niyamaḥ iti āhuḥ
cetana acetanāḥ gaja ādayaḥ
samavakīryante bahavaḥ ṛthāḥ asmin ati samavakāraḥ
yathā samudra mathanam
vijña priyā

original: (vi, ṭha) tatra nāyikānāyakayoḥ arthalābhārthaḥ śṛṅgāro veśyānāṃ;
analyzed: tatra nāyikā nāyakayoḥ artha lābha arthaḥ śṛṅgāraḥ veśyānām
dharma avirodhī śṛṅgāraḥ sva dāreṣu puṃsaḥ
samavakāra pada vyutpattim āha samavakīryyante iti
locanā

original: (lo, o) prahasano hāsyayuktaḥ prathamoddiṣṭo 'pi dharmaśṛṅgāraḥ paścād vidheyatvena paścād vyākhyātaḥ /
analyzed: prahasanaḥ hāsya yuktaḥ dharma śṛṅgāraḥ paścāt vidheya tvena paścāt vyākhyātaḥ

original: aniyamāditi kvaciddivyaḥ kvacinnaro vā nāyakaḥ arthaprakṛtayaḥ ārambhayatnādyāḥ /
analyzed: aniyamāt iti kvacid divyaḥ kvacid naraḥ vā nāyakaḥ artha prakṛtayaḥ ārambha yatna ādyāḥ
atha ḍimaḥ
māyā indrajāla saṃgrāma krodha udbhrānta ādi ceṣṭitaiḥ
uparāgaiḥ ca bhūyiṣṭhaḥ ḍimaḥ khyāta iti vṛttakaḥ
vijña priyā
vi ḍa ḍima saṃjñakam rūpakam āha atha iti
māyā iti
māyā ātmaka tvāt adṛśya tā
indrajālam alīka nānā vastu pradarśanam
saṅgrāma krodha udbhrānta ādi ceṣṭitam itas tatas vikṣepaḥ
uparāgaḥ upadravaḥ
aṅgī raudra rasaḥ tatra sarve ṅgāni rasāḥ punar
catvāraḥ ṅkāḥ matāḥ na iha viṣkambhaka praveśakau
nāyakāḥ deva gandharva yakṣa rakṣaḥ mahā uragāḥ
bhūta preta piśāca ādyāḥ ṣoḍaśā atyantam uddhatāḥ
vṛttayaḥ kauśikī hīnāḥ nirvimarśāḥ ca sandhayaḥ
dīptāḥ syuḥ ṣaṭ rasāḥ
atra udāharaṇam ca tripura dāhaḥ iti mahā ṛṣiḥ
atha ihāmṛgaḥ
īhāmṛgaḥ miśra vṛttaḥ catur aṅkaḥ prakīrtitaḥ

original: mukhapratimukhe sandhī tatra nirvahaṇaṃ tathā // VisSd_6.245 //
analyzed: mukha pratimukhe sandhī tatra nirvahaṇam tathā
nara divyau a niyamau nāyaka pratināyakau
khyātau dhīra uddhatau anyaḥ gūḍha bhāvāt ayukta kṛt
vijña priyā
īhāmṛga ākhyam rūpakam āha atha iha iti
miśra vṛttaḥ khyāta ākhyāta vṛttāntaḥ nirvahaṇa upasaṃhṛti rūpa siddhiḥ api tatra iti arthaḥ
nara divyau iti

original: narau vā divyau vā naradivyau vā nāyakapratināyakāvityarthaḥ /
analyzed: narau vā divyau vā nara divyau vā nāyaka pratināyakau iti arthaḥ
tayoḥ ādyaḥ dhīraḥ
antyaḥ uddhataḥ
sa ca mūḍha bhāvāt ayukta kārī
divya striyam an icchantī kapahāra ādinā icchataḥ
śṛṅgāra ābhāsam api asya kiñcid kiñcid pradarśayet
patākā nāyakāḥ divyāḥ martyāḥ vā api daśa uddhatāḥ
yuddham ānīya saṃrambham param vyājāt nivartate

original: mahādhmāno vadhaprāptā api vadhyāḥ syuratra no /

vijña priyā
vi na divya striyam an icchantīm icchataḥ śṛṅgāra ābhāsam api iti anvayaḥ

patākā nāyakāḥ daśa iti dvādhaśā

original: yuddhamiti yuddharūpaṃ saṃrambhaṃ vikramaṃ parabalamānīya prāpayya vyājāt nivarttayet ityarthaḥ /

original: agṛhṇato 'pi mūrkhasya puro yacca hitaṃ vacaḥ // VisSd_6.262 //

vijña priyā

hitam vacaḥ gṛhṇataḥ mūrkhasya iti anvayaḥ

vijña priyā

original: atra ca āhāryāropābhāvāt na rūpakaṃ kintu vāstavabhramāt bhrāntimadalaṅkāra eva /

original: tatra yathā mama-- dvijaḥ śākhāyuktastvayi kṛtakathaḥ kokila iti tvayākhyeyaṃ mande mayi virahipāte kiyadagham /

spaṣṭāni udāharaṇāni
yathākāma dattā

original: eteṣāṃ sarveṣāṃ nāṭakaprakṛtitve 'pi yathaicityaṃ yathālābhaṃ nāṭakoktaviśeṣaparigrahaḥ /
analyzed: eteṣām sarveṣām nāṭaka prakṛti tve pi yathaicityam yathālābham nāṭaka ukta viśeṣa parigrahaḥ

original: yatra ca nāṭakoktasyāpi punarupādānaṃ tatra tatsadbhāvasya niyamaḥ /
analyzed: yatra ca nāṭaka uktasya api punar upādānam tatra tad sadbhāvasya niyamaḥ
vijña priyā
bhāṇikā ākhyam uparūpakam āha atha iti
mandaḥ nikṛṣṭaḥ
asya kāryāṇi āha aupanyāsaḥ ityādi
teṣām lakṣaṇāni āha aupanyāsaḥ iti
nirveda vākyasya vyutpattiḥ vinyāsaḥ
sā ca vinyāsa saṃjñikā
kopa pīḍayā upālambha vacaḥ samarpaṇa ākhyam kāryam iti arthaḥ
nidarśanasya dṛṣṭāntasya upanyāsaḥ iti arthaḥ
kāryasya samāpanam mukhya kārya avāntara kāryasya iti arthaḥ
eṣām kāryāṇām sarva naṭakeṣu eva ucityāt sarva nāṭakānām eva etad kārya tvam āha eṣām iti
nāṭaka ukta viśeṣe parigrahaḥ iti vigrahaḥ
tathā ca bhāṇikā ukta kāryasya nāṭaka antare pi dātavyam uktam
yat ca iti
nāṭake hi ṣaṭtriṃśat lakṣaṇa alaṅkāra ādayaḥ ca uktāḥ

original: taduktavastuno yacca punarupādānaṃ nāṭakāntara iti bodhyam /
analyzed: tad ukta vastunaḥ yat ca punar upādānam nāṭaka antare iti bodhyam
tad sadbhāvasya iti tad sadbhāvasya iti arthaḥ
atha śravya kāvyāni
śravyam śrotavya mātram tat padya gadya mayam dvidhā
vijña priyā
vi jha śravya kāvyāni iti
tad prabeda dvayam āha padya gadyam iti
tatra padya mayāni āha
chandaḥ baddha padam padyam tena muktena muktakam

original: dvābhyāṃ tu yugmakaṃ sāṃdānatikaṃ tribhiriṣyate // VisSd_6.314 //
analyzed: dvābhyām tu yugmakam sāṃdānatikam tribhiḥ iṣyate
vijña priyā
vi ña dvābhyām ityādi caturṣu paraspara eka vākya tā āpanna tve sati iti vodhyam
kalāpakam caturbhiḥ ca pañcabhiḥ kulakam matam
tatra muktakam yathā mama

original: “sāndrānandamanantamavyayamajaṃ yadyogino 'pi kṣaṇaṃ sākṣātkartumupāsate prati muhurdhyānaikatānāḥ param /
analyzed: sāndra ānandam anantam avyayam ajam yat yoginaḥ kṣaṇam sākṣātkartum upāsate prati muhur dhyāna ekatānāḥ param
dhanyāḥ tāḥ madhurā pirīyuvatayaḥ tat brahma yā kautukā
dāliṅganti samalapanti śatadhā ākarṣanti cumbanti ca
vijña priyā

original: (vi, ṭa) sāndrānandamiti--yatparaṃ prakṛṣṭaṃ brahma kṣaṇamapi sākṣātkatudhyānaikatānā
analyzed: sāndra ānandam iti yat param prakṛṣṭam brahma kṣaṇam api sākṣāt katu dhyāna ekatānā

original: dhyānamātrāviṣṭā yoginaḥ pratimuhurupāsate tadbrahma yā mathurāpurayuvatayaḥ kautukādāliṅgantītyādi tā dhanyaḥ /
analyzed: dhyāna mātra āviṣṭāḥ yoginaḥ pratimuhur upāsate tat brahma yāḥ mathurā pura yuvatayaḥ kautukāt āliṅganti ityādi tāḥ dhanyaḥ
yugmakam yathā mama
kim karoṣi kara upānte kānte
gaṇḍa sthalīm imām
praṇaya pravaṇaḥ kānte na ekānte na ucitāḥ krudhaḥ
iti yāvat kuraṅga akṣīm vaktum īhāmahe vayam
tāvat āvirabhūt cūte madhuraḥ madhupa dhvaniḥ
vijña priyā

original: (vi, ṭha) māninyā mānabhaṅgaprakāraṃ sakhyau kathayannāha--kiṃ karoṣītyādi /
analyzed: māninyāḥ māna bhaṅga prakāram sakhyau kathayan āha kim karoṣi ityādi

original: he kānte / karopānte imāṃ gaṇḍasthalīṃ kimarthaṃ karoṣi ?
analyzed: he kānte kara upānte imām gaṇḍa sthalīm kimartham karoṣi
tatas praṇaya pravaṇaḥ ityādi spaṣṭam

original: kuraṅgākṣīmiti vaktuṃ vayaṃ yāvadīhāmahe tāvanmadhuro madhupadhvaniḥ cūte āvirabhūt /
analyzed: kuraṅgākṣīm iti vaktum vayam yāvat īhāmahe tāvat madhuraḥ madhupa dhvaniḥ cūte āvirabhūt

original: atra prathamaślokārtho dvitīyaśloka utkikarmatvena ukta iti ekavākyatā /
analyzed: atra prathama śloka arthaḥ dvitīya ślokaḥ utki karma tvena uktaḥ iti ekavākyatā
evam anyāni api
vijña priyā
evam iti sandānitaka ādau api evam bodhyam iti arthaḥ

original: sargabandho mahākāvyaṃ tatraiko nāyakaḥ suraḥ // VisSd_6.315 //
analyzed: sargabandhaḥ mahākāvyam tatra ekaḥ nāyakaḥ suraḥ
sat vaṃśaḥ kṣatriyaḥ vā api dhīra udātta guṇa anvitaḥ

original: ekavaṃśabhavā bhūpāḥ kulajā bahavo 'pi vā // VisSd_6.316 //
analyzed: eka vaṃśa bhavāḥ bhūpāḥ kula jāḥ vā
śṛṅgāra vīra śāntānām ekaḥ ṅgī rasaḥ iṣyate

original: aṅgāni sarve 'pi rasāḥ sarve nāṭakasandhayaḥ // VisSd_6.317 //
analyzed: aṅgāni sarve pi rasāḥ sarve nāṭaka sandhayaḥ
itihāsa udbhavam vṛttam anyat vā sat jana āśrayam
vijña priyā
mahākāvya lakṣaṇam āha sargabandhaḥ ityādi
pariccheda rūpaḥ sargaḥ badhya etasmin iti sargabandhaḥ
suraḥ devaḥ
sarve nāṭaka sandhayaḥ mukha pratimukha ādayaḥ pañca
sat jana āśrayam varṇanīya uttama janasya vṛttam vā iti arthaḥ

original: catvārastasya vargāḥ syusteṣvekaṃ ca phalaṃ bhavet // VisSd_6.318 //
analyzed: catvāraḥ tasya vargāḥ syuḥ teṣu ekam ca phalam bhavet
ādau namaskriyā āśīḥ vā vastunirdeśaḥ eva vā

original: kvacinnindā khalādīnāṃ satāṃ ca guṇakīrtanam // VisSd_6.319 //
analyzed: kvacid nindā khala ādīnām satām ca guṇa kīrtanam
eka vṛtta mayaiḥ padyaiḥ avasāne nyavṛttakaiḥ

original: nāstisvalpā nātidīrghāḥ sargā aṣṭādhikā iha // VisSd_6.320 //
analyzed: na asti su alpāḥ na ati dīrghāḥ sargāḥ aṣṭa adhikāḥ iha
nānā vṛtta mayaḥ kā api sargaḥ kaścana dṛśyate

original: sargānte bhāvisargasya kathāyāḥ sūcanaṃ bhavet // VisSd_6.321 //
analyzed: sarga ante bhā visargasya kathāyāḥ sūcanam bhavet
saṃdhyā sūrya indu rajanī pradoṣa dhvānta vāsarāḥ
prātar madhyāhna mṛgayā śaila ṛtu vana sāgarāḥ
saṃbhāga vipralambhau ca muni svargapunā adhvarāḥ
raṇa prayāṇa upayama mantra mutra udaya ādayaḥ
varṇanīyāḥ yathāyogam sa aṅga upāṅgāḥ amī iha

original: kavervṛttasya vā nāmnā nāyakasyetarasya vā // VisSd_6.324 //
analyzed: kaveḥ vṛttasya vā nāmnā nāyakasya itarasya vā
nāma asya sarga upādeya kathayā sarga nāma tu
vijña priyā

original: (vi, ṇa) catvāra iti---dharmārthakāmamokṣā ye catvāro vargāsteṣvekamapi tatphalamityarthaḥ /
analyzed: vi na catvāraḥ iti dharma artha kāma mokṣāḥ ye catvāraḥ vargāḥ teṣu ekam api tad phalam iti arthaḥ
eka vṛtta mayaiḥ iti eka chandaḥ vyāptaiḥ iti arthaḥ
avasāne sarga ante

original: sāṅgopāṅga iti---amī sāndhyāsūryendvādayaḥ putrajanmāntā iha kāvye yathāyogaṃ yathāsambhavaṃ sāṅgopāṅgā varṇanīyā ityarthaḥ /
analyzed: sa aṅga upāṅgaḥ iti amī sāndhyā sūrya indu ādayaḥ putra janma antāḥ iha kāvye yathāyogam yathāsambhavam sa aṅga upāṅgāḥ varṇanīyāḥ iti arthaḥ
tatra sandhyā aṅgam cakravāka virahaḥ
rajanī aṅgam madhu pāna ādi
upāṅgam tatra eva parihāsa ādayaḥ
muniḥ nāradādiḥ
prayāṇam yātrā
upayamaḥ vivāhaḥ
mantraḥ mantraṇā
putra udayaḥ putra janma
itarasya pratināyakasya
tad nāmnā asya nāma iti arthaḥ

original: sargopādeyeti---sarge upādeyā varṇitā yā kathā tayā sarganāmetyarthaḥ /
analyzed: sarga upādeyā iti sarge upādeyā varṇitā yā kathā tayā sarga nāmā iti arthaḥ
sandhi aṅgāni yathālābham atra vidheyāni avasāne nyavṛttakaiḥ iti bahuvacanam avivakṣitam
sa aṅga upāṅgāḥ iti jalakeli madhau pāna ādayaḥ
yathā araghu vaṃśa śiśupālavaḥ naiṣadha ādayaḥ
yathā vā mama rāghava vilāsa ādiḥ
vijña priyā

original: (vi, ta) bahuvacanamavivakṣitamiti---avasāna ekasyāpi anyavṛttikasya dṛṣṭa tvāt /
analyzed: vi ta bahuvacanam avivakṣitam iti avasāne ekasya api anya vṛttikasya dṛṣṭa tvāt
yathā raghu vaṃśam iti
tatra vṛttasya nāmnā raghuvaṃśa iti
eka vaṃśa jāḥ bahu bhūpāḥ
pratināyakasya nāmnā śiśupāla vadhaḥ iti
naiṣadha ādau tu nāyakasya nāmnā
nāyakaḥ tu sat vaṃrājaḥ kṣattriyaḥ
asmin ārṣe punar sargāḥ bhavanti ākhyāna saṃjñakāḥ
asmin mahākāvye
yathā mahābhāratam
vijña priyā
vi asmin ārṣe iti ṛṣi praṇīte smin mahākāvye iti arthaḥ
ākhyāna saṃjñakāḥ iti

original: śiṣyaṃ prati guruṇāmākhyānaśāstrakathane yāḥ saṃjñā adhyāyarūpāstādṛśasaṃjñakā ityarthaḥ /
analyzed: śiṣyam prati guruṇām ākhyāna śāstra kathane yāḥ saṃjñāḥ adhyāya rūpāḥ tādṛśa saṃjñakāḥ iti arthaḥ
prākṛtaiḥ nirmite tasmin sargāḥ āśvāsa saṃjñakāḥ
chandasā skandhakena etat kvacid ralitakaiḥ api
yathā setubandhaḥ
yathā vā mama kuvalayāśva caritam
vijña priyā
vi daḥ skandhaka galitake chandaḥ viśeṣau
apabhraṃśa nibaddhe smin sargāḥ kuḍavaka abhidhāḥ
tathā apabhraṃśa yogyāni chandāṃsi vividhāni api
yathā karṇa parākramaḥ
vijña priyā
vi dha kaḍavaka abhidhāḥ kaḍavaka nāmānaḥ
bhāṣā vibhāṣā niyamāt kāvyam sarga samujjhitam
eka artha pravaṇaiḥ padyaiḥ saṃdhi sāmagrya varjitam
yathā abhikṣā aṭanam
āryāvilāsaḥ ca
vijña priyā
na bhāṣā viśeṣa iti tādṛśa vākye saṃskṛta prākṛta bhāṣayoḥ aniyamaḥ
khaṇḍakāvyam bhavet kāvyasya eka deśa anusāri ca
yathā meghadūta ādi
koṣaḥ śloka samūhaḥ tu syāt anyonya anapekṣakaḥ
vrajyā krameṇa racitaḥ saḥ eva ati manoramaḥ
vijña priyā
vi pa anyonya anapekṣakaḥ anyonya nirapekṣakaḥ
sajātīyānām ekatra sanniveśaḥ vrajyā
yathā muktāvalī ādiḥ
atha gādya kāvyāni
vijña priyā
vi vrajyā padārtham āha sajātīyānām iti
varṇanīya aikyena sājātyam
tatra gadyam

original: vṛttagandhojjitaṃ gadyaṃ muktakaṃ vṛttagandhi ca // VisSd_6.330 //

analyzed: bhavet utkalikā prāyam cūrṇakam ca caturvidham
ādyam samāsa rihitam vṛtta bhāga yutam param
anyat dīrgha samāsa āḍhyam ca alpa samāsakam
vijña priyā
vi vṛtta gandha ujjhitam iti
tad cāturvidhyam āha muktakam iti
ādyam muktakam
param vṛtta gandhiḥ
vṛttam akṣara saṃkhyātam chandaḥ tat akadeśa yuktam iti arthaḥ
turyam caturtham cūrṇakam
muktakam yathā guruḥ vacasi pṛthuḥ urasi ityādi
vṛtta gandhi yathā mama
samara kaṇḍūla nibiḍa bhuja daṇḍa kuṇḍalīkṛta kodaṇḍa śiñjinī ṭaṃkāra ujjāgarita vairi nagaraḥ ityādi
atra kuṇḍalīkṛta kodaṇḍaḥ eti anuṣṭubh vṛttasya pādaḥ
samara kaṇḍūlaḥ iti ca prathama akṣara dvaya rihitaḥ tasya eva pādaḥ
utkalikā prāyam yathā mama eva aṇi sa visuma raṇi sida sara visara vidalita samara parigada pavara para valaḥ ityādi
cūrṇakam yathā
jagadeka nāgara
kāminīmadana
jana rañjanaḥ ityādi
vijña priyā

original: (vi, bha) samarakaṇḍuleti--samarotsāhena kaṇḍule nibiḍe dṛḍhe bhujadaṇḍe kuṇḍalīkṛtakodaṇḍasya śiñjinyāḥ guṇasya ṭaṅkāreṇa ujjagaritaṃ vairinagaraṃ  #
analyzed: vi samara kaṇḍula iti samara utsāhena kaṇḍule nibiḍe dṛḍhe bhuja daṇḍe kuṇḍalīkṛta kodaṇḍasya śiñjinyāḥ guṇasya ṭaṅkāreṇa ujjagaritam vairi nagaram
yena
he tādṛśa iti arthaḥ
atra vṛtta bhāga yukta tvam darśayati atra iti
prathama akṣara traya rahitaḥ iti etasya eva anuṣṭubhaḥ eva
samara iti akṣarati age
kaṇḍūla nibiḍa bhūjaḥ
iti evaṃrūpaḥ
aṇiseti aniśa viṣama niśita śara visara vidalita parigha gada para balaḥ iti saṃskṛtam

original: aniśaṃ viṣamānāṃ niśitānāṃ śarāṇaṃ visareṇa--pātena vidalitāḥ parighāḥ mudrarāḥ gadāśca yatra tādṛśaṃ parabalaṃ yasmāt,
analyzed: aniśam viṣamānām niśitānām visareṇa pātena vidalitāḥ parighāḥ gadāḥ ca yatra tādṛśam para balam yasmāt
he tādṛśa iti arthaḥ

original: guṇaratnasāgaretyādi---atra rephāntaṃ nāma dvayaṃ nāntañca sambodhanadvayamalpasamāsakam /
analyzed: guṇa ratna sāgara ityādi atra repha antam nāma dvayam na antam ca sambodhana dvayam alpa samāsakam

original: kathāyāṃ sarasaṃ vastu gadyaireva vinimitam // VisSd_6.332 //
analyzed: kathāyām sarasam vastu gadyaiḥ eva vinimitam
kvacid atra bhavet āryā kvacid vaktra apavaktrake
ādau padyaiḥ namaskāraḥ khala ādeḥ vṛtta kīrtanam
vijña priyā
vi ma kathā rūpa kāvya dhara mānaha kathāyām iti
āryāmātrākṛtam chandaḥ
vaktra apavaktrake chandaḥ viśeṣau
tasya dharma antarān āha ādau iti
yathā akādāmbaryādiḥ
ākhyāyikā kathāvat syāt kaveḥ vaśa anukīrtanam

original: asyāmanyakavīnāṃ ca vṛttaṃ padyaṃ kvacitkvacit // VisSd_6.334 //
analyzed: asyām anya kavīnām ca vṛttam padyam kvacid kvacid
kathā aṃśānām vyavacchedaḥ āśvāsaḥ iti vadhyate
āryāvaktra apavaktrāṇām chandasā yena kenacid
anya apadeśena āśvāsa mukhe bhāvi artha sūcanam
vijña priyā
vi yaḥ ākhyāyikā ātmaka kāvya dharmān āha ākhyāyikā iti
kathāvat sā iti sā kathā ukta dharma tulya dharmavatī iti arthaḥ
kathātaḥ viśeṣam āha kaveḥ iti
asyām iti asyām ākhyāyikāyām anya kavīnām ca vaṃśa ādi kīrtanam iti arthaḥ
tathā vṛtta akṣara saṃkhyātam chandaḥ kvacid kvacid iti arthaḥ
āśvāsaḥ iti āśvāsanā mātra paricchedaḥ iti arthaḥ

original: āryeti--āryādicchandasāṃ madhye yena kenacicchandasā āśvasasya mukheādau anyāpadeśena--anyacchalena bhāvyarthasya vakṣyamāṇārthasya sūcanamityarthaḥ
analyzed: ārya iti ārya ādi chandasām madhye yena kenacid chandasā āśvasasya mukhe ādau anya apadeśena anya chalena bhāvi arthasya vakṣyamāṇa arthasya sūcanam iti arthaḥ
yathā harṣacarita ādiḥ
api tu aniyamaḥ dṛṣṭaḥ tatra api anyaiḥ udīraṇāt

original: iti daṇḍyācāryavacanāt kecit ākhyāyikā nāyakenaiva nibaddhavyā” ityāhuḥ,
analyzed: iti daṇḍi ācārya vacanāt kecid ākhyāyikāḥ nāyakena eva nibaddhavyāḥ iti āhuḥ
tat ayuktam
ākhyāna ādayaḥ ca kathā ākhyāyikayoḥ eva antarbhāvāt na pṛthak uktāḥ
yat uktam daṇḍinā eva atrā eva antarbhaviṣyanti śeṣāḥ ca ākhyāna jātayaḥ
iti
eṣām udāharaṇam pañcatantra ādi
vijña priyā

original: (vi, ra) “ākhyāyikā nāyakenaiva nibaddhavyā” iti yad kenaciduktaṃ tad “āpitu“--ityādidaṇḍyācāryavacanādayuktamityarthaḥ /
analyzed: raḥ ākhyāyikāḥ nāyakena eva nibaddhavyāḥ iti yat kenacid uktam tat āpi tu ityādi daṇḍi ācārya vacanāt ayuktam iti arthaḥ
ākhyāna ādi rūpāṇām kāvya antaraṇām pṛthak yukti bījam āha ākhyāna ādayaḥ iti
yat uktam daṇḍinā evā iti yatas daṇḍinā evā uktam
atra eva antar ityādi iti arthaḥ
atha gadya padya mayāni
gadya padya mayam kāvyam campūḥ iti abhidhīyate
vijña priyā
campū saṃjñakam kāvya antaram āha gadya padya mayam iti
yathā deśa rāja caritam
gadya padya mayī rāja stutiḥ virudam ucyate
yathā aviruda maṇimālā
vijña priyā
vi va viruda maṇimālā prabandha viśeṣaḥ
karambhakam tu bhāṣābhiḥ vividhābhiḥ vinirmitam
yathā mama ṣoḍaśa bhāṣā mayī praśāsti ratnāvalī
evam anye pi bhedāḥ uddeśa mātra prasīddha tvāt ukta bheda anatikramāt ca na pṛthak lakṣitāḥ
vijña priyā
vi śaḥ evam anye api bhedāḥ iti
na pṛthak lakṣitāḥ iti anvayaḥ
pṛthak alakṣaṇe hetum āha auddeśa mātra siddha tvāt iti
tad tad kīrttana mātreṇa eva siddhāḥ na tu kṛta lakṣaṇaḥ
teṣām ukta prabheda lakṣaṇa ākrānta tvam eva iti āha ukta bhedān iti
iti śrī maheśvara nyāyālaṅkāra viracitāyām sāhityadarpaṇa ṭīkāyām ṣaṣṭha pariccheda vivaraṇam

original: iti sāhityadarpaṇo dṛśyaśravyakāvyanirūpaṇo nāma ṣaṣṭhaḥ paricchedaḥ /
analyzed: iti sāhityadarpaṇaḥ dṛśyaśravyakāvyanirūpaṇaḥ nāma ṣaṣṭhaḥ paricchedaḥ
